en.today: The way you view others and how you are seen in return comes into focus, dear Aries. As Venus and Pluto form a transformative alignment, offer grace to peers so you might see past preconceived notions and find substance beneath the surface. Your sympathy and benevolence will not only elevate your reputation but also expand your community. Just be mindful of your own needs and emotional well-being when the Taurus moon forms an unbalanced aspect with the Sagittarius sun. Shift your attention toward manifestation goals once the nodes of fate stir this evening, leaning into the power of visualization and positive thinking.

en.today: You'll be in an all-or-nothing mood, dear Leo, especially when it comes to matters of the heart. As Venus and Pluto form an intimate exchange, you won't have the patience to entertain partnerships that don't have a future or meet expectations. Honor what you need to feel desired, supported, and in tune with the companions you invest in. Try not to let a fear of being alone stop you from closing chapters while the Taurus moon and Sagittarius sun enter an unbalanced aspect this afternoon. Commit to long-term goals that align with your values once the nodes of fate stir tonight.

en.today: Allow your long-term aspirations to take new forms, dear Taurus, as Venus and Pluto align. This energy highlights how specific commitments may require some adjusting on your end, especially when building alongside a romantic partner or business associate. Recognize what you can gain from working on a team, ensuring that you and your counterpart are equally matched. As Luna continues through your sign, people will be eager to join your cause. However, an imbalance with the sun warns against entering into agreements or collaborations prematurely. Explore subcultures or communities you're unfamiliar with once the nodes of fate stir tonight.
